channel.title: Comments on: A World Without Sex: Adverts without the Perverts
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: suzmuse
item.dc:creator: suzmuse
item.description: Oooo, intriguing idea! And I too am so over the MM car ads. They're so awful I sometimes wonder if they're satire. But apparently not.
item.content:encoded: Oooo, intriguing idea! And I too am so over the MM car ads. They’re so awful I sometimes wonder if they’re satire. But apparently not.
